description: Dated from the Scottish Book Trade Index.| In verse.| This is a different issue from the copies at L.C.2873(20), L.C.2876.A(15), L.C.2887(3), Hall.197.h.1(25), NG.1170.i.9(3), NG.1170.i.9(4) and NG.1170.i.9(5). There are several differences which include a decorative border on p. [2] and 'By' in the imprint has an upper case 'B'.
